description: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native. Collaborated with designers and backend developers to implement features and functionalities aligned with the overall product vision.

Joined GuruCool Company as a React Native Developer, with additional responsibilities encompassing MERN stack development. Contributed to projects involving both front-end and back-end development, utilizing React Native for mobile application development and working on MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js for full-stack development tasks.
Completed Frontend certification and training program from Digikull, enhancing proficiency in modern frontend technologies and frameworks.

Obtained a Bachelor's degree in Computer Applications (BCA) with a comprehensive understanding of programming languages. Transitioned focus to Web Development, participating in coding competitions and securing third place. Additionally, contributed to two government projects facilitated by the Karnataka Science and Technology Academy (KSTA)..
